description: Schnackel Engineers, Inc. is a leading Mechanical, Electrical, Plumbing, Fire Protection, and Information Technology consulting firm with offices in New York, Miami, Omaha, Los Angeles, Seattle, and Honolulu. Specializing in providing innovative and cost-effective MEP/FP/IT services to the retail, shopping center, and mixed-use development markets, Schnackel Engineers has designed millions of square feet of commercial and retail property across over 20,000 projects. The company has also introduced AI for MEP®, a groundbreaking design process utilizing Artificial Intelligence software to revolutionize MEP engineering.
responsibilities: The MEP Project Manager will be responsible for overseeing the mechanical, electrical, plumbing, fire protection, and information technology components of projects. Day-to-day tasks include project planning, project management, client communication and managing team and project processes to ensure successful project delivery.

qualifications.required: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field, MEP (Mechanical Electrical and Plumbing), Plumbing skills, Project Management skills, Project budgeting/planning skills, Experience with managing MEP projects and delivery, Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, Excellent communication and teamwork skills, Ability to work well with clients and meet deadlines.
qualifications.preferred: Engineering certifications are preferred and very much valued.
